title: Full kitchen in apartment, Bad Credit Ok, Sparkling swimming pool
posting_body: ['Bonanza Apartments in Las Vegas', 'Low Weekly & Monthly Rates', 'FREE Utilities', 'Free Premium Cable TV', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'Additional Information:', '<URL>', 'Apartment Home Features', '-BBQ area and gazebo', '-On Las Vegas CAT bus line', '-Laundry Facility', '-High-speed wireless internet available', '-Siegel Rewards Program', '-Free utilities included', '-Bad Credit Ok', '-Sparkling swimming pool', '-No long term lease required', '-Fully furnished and unfurnished apartments', '-Elevator to upper level apartments', '-Large studio apartments', 'Free Siegel Reward Program', 'Earn points every time you pay your rent or refer a friend.', 'Use your points to treat yourself to', 'free rent, food, movies, gift cards', ', and much more!', 'Pet Policy', '20lb weight limit and aggressive breeds such as Pit Bulls and Rottweilers are prohibited.', 'Managed by The Siegel Group', 'Equal Housing Opportunity', 'Pricing may include current special and is subject to change without notice.']
